comments.body: I know that this comes out from RMB, but in any case it does sound a li'l bit awkward to me. How about reformatting this to something along the lines of `This file handles device configuration collection for a given resource. It parses and populates the facts tree based on such config'. I'll add Sandra to check it out too. Thanks!
From a docs perspective, this is not surfaced at all (only visible within this file itself). So I suggest if you want to change things, update the RMB and it will be picked up by future modules.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +6,10 @@"""
The nxos l3_interfaces fact class
It is in this file the configuration is collected from the device
for a given resource, parsed, and the facts tree is populated
based on the configuration.
